name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Social: Get Facebook Alerts & Fonts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive your Facebook notifications instantly in your browser, beautify your Facebook posts, play with status sizes and more.
short.fr: Recevez vos notifications Facebook directement dans votre navigateur, embellissez vos publications Facebook, et bien plus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Social (former Facefont) improves your daily use of Facebook. Customize the font of your Facebook posts, get instantly notified in your browser when a new notification arrives on Facebook, and more.
long.fr: Better Social (ex Facefont) am√©liore votre utilisation quotidienne de Facebook. Personnalisez la police de vos publications Facebook, recevez vos notifications directement dans votre navigateur, et bien plus.
